name: From higher to lower even numbers
instruction:
The function `decreaseEven` takes two numbers `num1` and `num2`.

The number `num1` will always be greater than or equal to `num2` and both numbers will always be positive.

The function should return an array containing all even numbers in the range num1 to num2 inclusive.

The numbers must be in descending order.

An example of running the function:
```javascript
decreaseEven(10, 2) // [10, 8, 6, 4, 2]
decreaseEven(8, 4) // [8, 6, 4]
```
